title: (x) black geometric cutout face - P22 Constructivist, hand drawn {Bert}
content:
Okey, i admit maybe [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194827/http:/typophile.com/node/33281) one is hard for us but anybody know what font is being used in these graphics?

Are they same or different?

thanks  
-Mert

 [‹ (x) Cuba decorative face on poster - Motter Ombra {David H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194827/http:/typophile.com/node/30296 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Vizcaya copperplate script - hand drawn {Andrew J Sipe} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194827/http:/typophile.com/node/33303 "Go to next forum topic")
author: plush

comments.content: oh, ok.. but can you identify them for me? :)

The top one is Constructivist Block (or Solid) from P22

[http://www.p22.com/products/constructivist.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194827/http:/www.p22.com/products/constructivist.html "http://www.p22.com/products/constructivist.html")

The other 3 are handmade takes on that.
